resources.string: Github user Adamocho is the creator of this app.

string-array.name: camera_desc
string-array.item: Canon F1 - Professional 35mm SLR analog camera with FD lens mount.
Olympus OM1 - Outstanding build quality. One of the best 35mm SLR film camera.
Nikon FM2/T - This SLR 35mm film camera is a true monstrosity made out of titanium for professionals only.

string-array.name: accessories_desc
string-array.item: Protra 400 - Considered to be the best color film in existence.
Ilford Delta 3200 - High sensitivity B&W film made for low light situations.
CineStill 800t - Astonishing color film, which creates memorable results.
Ilford HP5 Plus - Professional B&W film suitable for every challenge.
Kodak Gold 200 - Cheap film preserving it\'s nostalgic mood.
Remote shutter release - Still photos deemed impossible without it.
